recipe.title: Spiced Green Tahini Sauce
instructions: Pulse garlic, cilantro, parsley, cumin, fenugreek, and 2 teaspoons salt in a food processor until similar in texture to pesto. Add tahini and lemon juice; process 30 seconds (mixture will be very thick and gray). With motor running, gradually drizzle in 3/4 cup water and process, adding more water to thin if needed, until sauce is light green and the consistency of sour cream. Season with salt.

Pulse garlic, cilantro, parsley, cumin, fenugreek, and 2 teaspoons salt in a food processor until similar in texture to pesto. Add tahini and lemon juice; process 30 seconds (mixture will be very thick and gray).
With motor running, gradually drizzle in 3/4 cup water and process, adding more water to thin if needed, until sauce is light green and the consistency of sour cream. Season with salt.
